page.title: 17TRADITIONAL DANCING,Yeoford.
page.content: At our school we do traditional dancing. One of the dances we do is called Maypole Dancing. There is a big pole in the middle and there are different coloured ribbons. They are red, blue, yellow and green. One dance that we do is called Single Plaiting, another dance is called Double Plaiting, another dance is the Barber's Pole and the last dance is called the Spider's Web. As well as Maypole Dancing, we do Broom Dancing with one of the teachers. One Saturday two teachers and one adult and nine children went to the first{Exeter Health Fair. It was a very enjoyable day. We did broom dancing. The lady who organised it gave the broom dancers a tee_shirt each and a certificate each. We also do Scottish Dancing. The teacher who teaches Scottish Dancing comes from Scotland!
